review: I already have a Smart TV however the apps or limited, so I needed a streaming box. I picked the fire stick as I have a prime membership and can take advantage of the movie/music streaming very easily.The problem with this stick is the storage. I loaded two apps (DS Video and DS Audio for my Synology NAS) and now only have 300mb of space left. I can not delete any apps to free up space and can't see what is using up the 5GBs of storage I apparently have on the stick.I also found the connection a bit wonky at times. Wireless connection stops randomly for the fire stick when it is still running fine for other devices and even other networks through my TV.
